accordion.html.name: Accordion
accordion.html.description: While remaining backward compatible, the recommended markup has been updated to implement the [WAI-ARIA 1.1 Accordion design pattern](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-practices-1.1/#accordion) to better support accessibility for keyboard and screen reader users.

actionmenu.html.name: Action Menu
actionmenu.html.description: Simply an action button with a Popover. Note that the `is-selected` class should be applied to the button when the menu is open. Also note the accessibility roles are different for an action menu vs a normal menu.

assetlist.html.name: Asset List
assetlist.html.description: A selectable list of Assets, often used inside of Miller Columns.

decoratedtextfield.html.name: Text Field - Decorated
decoratedtextfield.html.description: A Spectrum text field with an additional icon. The icon must be the Small size (18px) in order for it to be positioned correctly.

dialog.html.name: Dialog
dialog.html.description: In order to avoid blurry Dialogs, wrap them in `<div class="spectrum-Dialog-wrapper">` and apply `.is-open` to both the Wrapper and the Dialog at the same time. See [this example](dialogAlert.html) for a working demonstration.

dropindicator.html.name: Drop Indicator
dropindicator.html.description: A Drop Indicator is used to show the insertion position into a list or table.

dropzone.html.name: Dropzone
dropzone.html.description: A Drop Zone is an area on the screen into a which an object can be dragged and dropped to accomplish a task. For example, a Drop Zone might be used in an upload workflow to enable the user to simply drop a file from their operating system into the Drop Zone, which is a more efficient and intuitive action, rather than utilize the standard "Choose File" dialog.

page.html.name: Page
page.html.description:
The outer page container. A parent tag should only have the `.spectrum` class if using a standalone CSS file.
If using multistops, a parent tag should have both the `.spectrum` class and the corresponding colorstop variant class, i.e. `.spectrum--light`.
Finally, if scaling to large with the diff strategy, a parent tag should have the `.spectrum--large` class.

quickaction.html.name: Quick Actions
quickaction.html.description: Note that the `.spectrum-QuickActions-overlay` class should be placed on the container where the Quick Actions are displayed, and the `.spectrum-QuickActions--textOnly` class should be applied when the buttons have text only.

searchwithin.html.name: Search Within
searchwithin.html.description: Override the width of the component where necessary.

actionbar.html.name: Action Bar
actionbar.html.description: Floating action bar that appears in selection mode.

table-actionbar.html.name: Table - Multi-Select with ActionBar
table-actionbar.html.description: The quiet multi-select div table with an action bar pop over from the bottom of the table.

alert-closeable.html.name: Alert - Closable
alert-closeable.html.description: An Alert with a close button in the footer. Combine this strategy with any variant.

button-over-background.html.name: Button - Over Background
button-over-background.html.description: A Spectrum button that's meant to be placed over a non-standard color. In order to implement this button, you must set the CSS color property of a parent element to the same value as the background the button is placed against.

button-quiet-over-background.html.name: Button - Quiet Over Background
button-quiet-over-background.html.description: A Spectrum quiet button that's meant to be placed over a non-standard color. In order to implement this button, you must set the CSS color property of a parent element to the same value as the background the button is placed against.

logicbutton.html.name: Logic Button
logicbutton.html.description: A button that toggles between and/or when clicked.

calendar-range.html.name: Calendar - Range Selection
calendar-range.html.description:
A calendar with a range selected.
`.is-selection-start` goes on the first day in the selection, and `.is-range-start` goes on the first day of each week or month in the middle of a selection (but not the first day of the selection).
`.is-selection-end` goes on the last day of the selection, and `.is-range-end` goes on the last day of each week or month in the middle of the selection (but not on the last day of the selection).

card-asset.html.name: Card - Asset preview
card-asset.html.description: Standard cards will full-sized asset previews are not supported, don't do this.

card-gallery.html.name: Card - Gallery
card-gallery.html.description: A spectrum gallery card for an image

card-quiet-file.html.name: Card - Quiet, File
card-quiet-file.html.description: A spectrum Quiet Card for a file asset

card-quiet-folder.html.name: Card - Quiet, Folder
card-quiet-folder.html.description: A spectrum Quiet Card for a folder asset

card-quiet-large.html.name: Card - Quiet, Large Image
card-quiet-large.html.description: A spectrum Quiet Card for an image

card-quiet-small.html.name: Card - Quiet, Small Image
card-quiet-small.html.description: A spectrum Quiet Card for an image

card-small.html.name: Card - Small
card-small.html.description: Small cards are not supported, don't do this.

card.html.name: Card
card.html.description: The standard Card component with cover photo and footer.

circleloader-indeterminate-default.html.name: Circle Loader - Indeterminate
circleloader-indeterminate-default.html.description: An indeterminate Spectrum Loader of default type (round)

circleloader-large-over-background.html.name: Circle Loader - Over Background - Large
circleloader-large-over-background.html.description: A Spectrum loader of default type (round) for using over a background color.

circleloader-medium-over-background.html.name: Circle Loader - Over Background
circleloader-medium-over-background.html.description: A Spectrum loader of default type (round) for using over a background color.

circleloader-small-over-background.html.name: Circle Loader - Over Background - Small
circleloader-small-over-background.html.description: A Spectrum loader of default type (round) for using over a background color.

fieldgroup-default.html.name: Field Group
fieldgroup-default.html.description: A group of fields, usually Radios or Checkboxes.

fieldgroup-labelsbelow.html.name: Field Group - Labels Below
fieldgroup-labelsbelow.html.description: Put the labels below by adding the modifier class to the field itself.

fieldlabel-required.html.name: Field Label - Required
fieldlabel-required.html.description: Field label for a required field.

fieldlabel.html.name: Field Label
fieldlabel.html.description: Field label for use with form inputs.

illustratedmessage-cta.html.name: IllustratedMessage - CTA
illustratedmessage-cta.html.description: The IllustratedMessage component, used for instruction/call to action.

illustratedmessage.html.name: IllustratedMessage
illustratedmessage.html.description: The IllustratedMessage component, used for status and errors.

datepicker-quiet.html.name: Date Picker - Quiet
datepicker-quiet.html.description: A date picker uses the input group component to display a field with a button next to it

datepicker-range-quiet.html.name: Date Picker - Range Quiet
datepicker-range-quiet.html.description: A date picker uses the input group component to display a field with a button next to it

datepicker-range.html.name: Date Picker - Range
datepicker-range.html.description: A date picker uses the input group component to display a field with a button next to it

datepicker.html.name: Date Picker
datepicker.html.description: A date picker uses the input group component to display a field with a button next to it

popover-dialog.html.name: Popover - Dialog style
popover-dialog.html.description: Spectrum Popovers are implemented using the Dialog's inner elements.

radio-invalid.html.name: Radio - Invalid
radio-invalid.html.description: The invalid variant for radio button.

rating-active.html.name: Rating - Active
rating-active.html.description: The active state of the Rating element.

rating-disabled.html.name: Rating - Disabled
rating-disabled.html.description: The disabled state of the Rating element.

dial-label.html.name: Dial - With label
dial-label.html.description: A dial for turning it up to 11, now with labels.

dial.html.name: Dial
dial.html.description: A dial for turning it up to 11.

slider-player.html.name: Slider - Video Player
slider-player.html.description: Displays a buffer for video players.

slider-range.html.name: Slider - Range
slider-range.html.description: A range slider with two handles.

stepper-default.html.name: Stepper
stepper-default.html.description: Note that you must manually apply the `.is-focused` class, and that the `.is-focused` styles below don't look correct unless your cursor is actually in the stepper input field.

stepper-quiet.html.name: Stepper - Quiet
stepper-quiet.html.description: The quiet variant of the Stepper.

table-dividers.html.name: Table - Column Dividers
table-dividers.html.description: The standard table with column dividers

tabs-compact.html.name: Tabs - Compact
tabs-compact.html.description: Compact tabs should never be used without the quiet variation. Please use [Quiet Compact Tabs instead](#tabs---quiet-compact).

tabs-toomany.html.name: Tabs - Too many
tabs-toomany.html.description: How to handle too many tabs.

tags.html.name: Tags
tags.html.description: A taglist with items that cannot be edited.

textarea.html.name: Text Area
textarea.html.description: A Spectrum text area - (a multiline text field)

toggle-abdefault.html.name: Switch - A/B toggle
toggle-abdefault.html.description: The a/b toggle variant of the switch.

toggle-onoffdefault.html.name: Switch - On/Off
toggle-onoffdefault.html.description: The on/off variant of the Switch.

toggle-onoffquiet.html.name: Switch - On/Off - Quiet
toggle-onoffquiet.html.description: The quiet variant of the Switch.

treeview-disabled.html.name: Tree View - Disabled
treeview-disabled.html.description:
A nested Spectrum tree view with disabled item.
Because the tree view is nested, the visibility of child items is controlled by the open state of the parent item.

treeview-flat.html.name: Tree View - Flat
treeview-flat.html.description:
A Spectrum tree view drawn without nesting, suitable for infinite scrolling.
With this version of the tree, you must manage the visibility of "child items" manually based on the open state of the "parent item."

treeview-icons.html.name: Tree View - Nested with icons
treeview-icons.html.description: A nested Spectrum tree view with icons

treeview.html.name: Tree View - Nested
treeview.html.description:
A nested Spectrum tree view.
Because the tree view is nested, the visibility of child items is controlled by the open state of the parent item.

typography.html.name: Typography
typography.html.description: English typography examples. See the [typography example page](typography.html) for Japanese, Han, and Arabic examples.
